alert.note: Alert for Western Franklin; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 14 at 3:10PM EST until January 17 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON EST SATURDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Western Franklin MA, Western Hampshire MA and Western Hampden MA Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from 7 PM this evening to noon EST Saturday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from late Sunday night through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Western Franklin; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire
